participant_1.background:
I'm passionate about photography and I have a great mentor in my father.
i just graduated high school with honors.
my favorite hero is superman.
i live in my parents basement.
i like to bike.

participant_2.background:
I bought my first guitar when I was 14 years old.
i try to limit how much i eat.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time.
i am a competitive ski racer.

content.text: Hey! Not bad, how about you?
Good, just got back from a nice bike ride, what are you up to?
I wish I could go biking, my car is acting up and I need it to get to my music lesson.
Oh no! That sucks, hopefully you can get it fixed soon. What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar, I've been playing for about 10 years now.
Wow that's awesome, I've always wanted to learn to play the guitar.
You should definitely give it a try, it's a lot of fun.
Yeah, maybe I will. I'm just not sure where to start.
There are a lot of great resources online, you could check out youtube or something.
Oh that's a good idea, I'll do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
So what's your favorite thing to do on your days off?
I love to go skiing, I'm a competitive ski racer.
That sounds really fun, I've never been skiing before.
You should definitely try it sometime, it's a blast.
Yeah, I might have to give it a try. Thanks for the suggestion.
